description:
In Greenbelt, Maryland, a commercial legal issue does not always mean going to court, but it does necessitate the help of a trusted law firm. Our team at McNamee, Hosea, Jernigan, Kim, Greenan & Lynch, P.A., knows the importance of swiftly handling matters such as disputes, claims and litigation. We also are prepared to advise our clients on matters such as succession planning, business formation and real estate transactions. Our comprehensive approach to every type of case is why we are known as “the business owner’s law firm.”

For more than 30 years, our law firm has been working with people throughout Maryland and in Alexandria, Virginia. We prioritize the client’s needs, identifying his or her goals, and developing a plan that focuses on getting those results. Through clear, responsive communication, we are able to build a strong relationship with those we represent, thus providing them with confidence and clarity regarding their case.

At McNamee, Hosea, Jernigan, Kim, Greenan & Lynch, P.A., we are fortunate to have more than 25 experienced attorneys ready to tackle any commercial matter. No case is too big or too small for our law firm. We look forward to helping our clients navigate current legal matters, as well as determine and mitigate risks that could appear down the road.
